org.dotplot.fileutil
Class FileUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.fileutil.FileUtil
public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Provides several static methods for file handling, like im-/export or display of Dialogs.

showFileDialog

public static java.lang.String showFileDialog(Shell shell,
                                              java.lang.String title,
                                              java.lang.String[] filterExtensions)
Displays a SWT FileDialog.

Parameters:
shell - the shell.
title - the title.
filterExtensions - list of extensions to filter the displayed files. May be null.
Returns:
the selected file name or null, if the user clicked "cancel".
